subject: Running a set of tests with different data
msgSnippet: Hi, I have recently started working with JUnit and would like to know if it is possible to do this and how to do it if somebody has already done this. I have a
messageBody:
Hi,

I have recently started working with JUnit and would like to know if
it is possible to do this and how to do it if somebody has already
done this.

I have a set of tests cases that I need to run with different input
data which I am reading from a file. I want to automate running the
tests with different input files. Can I do this or do I need to do
it through a batch program giving the filenames as the input
parameter?

Thanks,
Nusrat
